name: Cybermonk
description:
Cybermonk is a competitive multiplayer take on classic block pushing puzzles, a geometric brain teaser that takes sacrifice to win.

Two clans face off in tense, rapid-fire matches in a temple lit up by scorching lasers. Players move and rotate mirrors to reflect the lasers, chaining them together to connect with their clan’s power portal.

The first clan to fully charge their portal is proven righteous, while the other has failed their god.
